briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of NNC-0156-0000-0009 During Surgical Procedures in Subjects With Haemophilia B
officialTitle: An Open-label, Multi-centre, Un-controlled Trial to Assess Efficacy and Safety of NNC-0156-0000-0009 During Surgical Procedures in Patients With Haemophilia B
summary:
This trial is conducted in Africa, Asia, Europe and the United States of America (USA).

The aim of the trial is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of NNC-0156-0000-0009 (nonacog beta pegol) during surgical procedures in patients with haemophilia B.

primaryOutcome.measure: Haemostatic Effect During Surgery Evaluated by the Four-point Response Scale (Excellent, Good, Moderate, Poor)
